search.query:
|makeresults |eval usetstats="Yes" |eval notstats="No" |eval tstatstag=`tstatstag`
|eval tstats_count=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats count where","") |eval tstats_nulls=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","")
|eval tstats_dc_id=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc(resource.data.id) as Count where","") |eval stats_dc_id=if(tstatstag=="No","|stats dc(resource.data.id) as Count ","")
|eval stats_count=if(tstatstag=="No", "|stats count ", "")
|eval count_type=if(tstatstag!=" ","sum(count)","count")

$tstats_dc_id$ `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Instance $text_search$ $stats_dc_id$ by _time, name, resource.$datatag$name, resource.$datatag$status, resource.$datatag$id, resource.$datatag$machineType, update_time | eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") |eval zone=replace(name,"\S+zones\/(\S+)\/instances\S+","\1")
search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |dedup resource.$datatag$id sortby -update_time |search resource.$datatag$status="Running" |stats dc(resource.$datatag$id) as count

search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |dedup resource.$datatag$id sortby -update_time |search resource.$datatag$status="SUSPENDED" OR resource.$datatag$status="SUSPENDING" |stats dc(resource.$datatag$id) as count
search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |dedup resource.$datatag$id sortby -update_time |search resource.$datatag$status="TERMINATED" |stats count as count
|stats count by projectid |rename projectid as Project_ID
search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) | stats count by zone

panel.html: Usage note: a search time>6hrs will potentially result in instances that no longer exist be displayed

search.query: search resource.$datatag$status="Running" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) | stats count by resource.$datatag$id, resource.$datatag$machineType | rename resource.$datatag$machineType as mType | eval Type=replace(mType,"^\S+machineTypes\/(\S+)","\1") | stats count by Type

panel.title: Running Instances by Zones Over Time

search.query: search resource.$datatag$status="Running" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) | timechart count by zone

|tstats count where (index=gcp_json OR index=gcp) sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "$datatag$logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" "$datatag$resource.type"=gce_instance by _time, $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName,$datatag$protoPayload.methodName, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.zone |rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as methodName $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName as name, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id as projectid, $datatag$resource.labels.zone as zone |search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |rename $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType as Action |timechart count by Action

search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |dedup resource.$datatag$id sortby -update_time | rename resource.$datatag$machineType as mType resource.$datatag$id as "Instance ID"| eval Type=replace(mType,"^\S+machineTypes\/(\S+)","\1") | eval Name=replace(name,"^\S+instances\/(\S+)","\1") |table "Instance ID" , Name, projectid, zone, resource.$datatag$status, Type, update_time |rename projectid as ProjectID, resource.$datatag$status as "Last Known Status" update_time as "Last Update"

search.query: $tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.type=gce_instance $stats_count$ by _time, $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName, $datatag$protoPayload.methodName, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType, $datatag$protoPayload.response.user, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.zone |rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as methodName $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName as Instance, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType as Action, $datatag$protoPayload.response.user as User $datatag$resource.labels.project_id as projectid, $datatag$resource.labels.zone as zone |search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |table _time, Instance, Action, User

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.type=gce_instance $stats_count$ by _time, $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName,$datatag$protoPayload.methodName, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType, $datatag$protoPayload.response.user, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.zone |rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as methodName $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName as Instance, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType as Action, $datatag$protoPayload.response.user as User $datatag$resource.labels.project_id as projectid, $datatag$resource.labels.zone as zone |search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |chart sum(count) by User, Action | addtotals |sort by -Total |rename Total as "Total Actions"

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.type=gce_instance $stats_count$ by _time, $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName,$datatag$protoPayload.methodName, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.labels.zone, $datatag$protoPayload.status.message, $datatag$protoPayload.response.error.errors{}.reason, $datatag$severity, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail |rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as methodName $datatag$protoPayload.resourceName as Instance, $datatag$protoPayload.response.operationType as Action, $datatag$resource.labels.project_id as projectid, $datatag$resource.labels.zone as zone, $datatag$protoPayload.status.message as Message, $datatag$protoPayload.response.error.errors{}.reason as Reason, $datatag$severity as Severity, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as User |search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |timechart count by Reason
